title: Can't comment boards
body: I tried to comment on another lol board but it continuously stated that I needed to login to comment even though I already did?

replies.body:
Not sure why I can't comment on the item sets and the new client page. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/1fBRmemG-where-are-the-item-sets?show=flat
Realized that it was because I had never posted before on the boards and had to create a post first

*Wolfess* hit the nail on the head here. What specific boards were you trying to visit? Can you provide me a link or a screenshot via [Gyazo](https://gyazo.com/)?

With a bit more info, I can check this out.

If it is a different region then you are required to log in to that region separately from NA because the boards for each region are (I believe) housed in different servers in their respective regions.

If it's here in NA, then log out and then log back in and see if it still gives you that problem. Looks like this was your first post so the boards needs to update your info from your game account to load like your summoner level, icon, etc. It's to prevent spam bot accounts from just making accounts and spamming the boards with scam sites, advertisements, etc.
